title: 3D Virtual Tour - 2 BR, 2 BA Condo 1,160 Sq. Ft. - Parking Option
posting_body: ['Western SoMa - 2 BR, 2 BA Condo 1,160 Sq.', 'Ft. - 3D Virtual Tour', 'Property Address', '140 South Van Ness Avenue, Unit #429 | San Francisco, CA 94103', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Golden Gate Properties', 'Description', '3D Virtual Tour:', '<URL>', 'Large unfurnished 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo with all the luxuries: hardwood floors in living area, carpet in bedroom, ample storage space, walk-in closet, upgraded stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer in the unit and balcony with city views.', 'Building includes a state of the art gym, a courtyard/BBQ area and conference room.', 'Easy access to freeways I-280, I-80 and HWY101, downtown San Francisco, the Financial District, the Mission District, and all modes of public transportation; Muni & blocks from Civic Center BART Station.', 'FEATURES:', '•2 Bedrooms', '•2 Baths', '•1,160 Sq.', 'Ft.', '•Kitchen Appliances Included', '•Washer & Dryer Included', 'AMENITIES:', '•Secured Parking available through building (+$300 a month, based on availability)', '•Fitness Center on main floor', '•Conference room for meetings or presentations (by appointment)', '•Park-like courtyard with full furnishings, fountain, and barbecue grills', '•Secured building with intercom entry system', '•Easy access to freeways I-280, I-80 and HWY101, downtown San Francisco, the Financial District, the Mission District, and all modes of public transportation; Muni & blocks from Civic Center BART Station', 'SHOWINGS:', '1.', "Schedule Appointment through 'Contact Us' on the Property Page:", '<URL>', '2.', 'Showing Guidelines Will Be Sent After a Completed Guest Card', '•Applicant(s) Must Physically View the Unit Prior to Submitting Application(s)', '•FaceTime, Skype, Zoom, or Any Other Virtual Viewing Platform/Resource Is Not Accepted as a Replacement of Physical Viewings', 'APPLICATION PROCESS:', '1.', 'Applicant(s) Must Attend Viewing Together Prior to Submitting Individual Applications', '2.', 'Applications Will Be Reviewed Once All Intended Residents Have Attended Viewing Together & Submitted An Application', '•$35 Application Fee Per Person Over 18', '•Application Fee Is Non-Refundable', '•Ownership Will Not Consider Co-Signers', '•Complete Online Application - <URL>/', '•Marketing of This Unit Will Continue Until We’ve Received Move-in Funds From an Executed Lease', 'LEASING TERMS:', '•Available Now', '•12 Month Lease', '•Parking Based on Availability Through Building (+$300 per vehicle)', '•Security Deposit Equivalent to One Month of Rent', '•Building Move-In/Move-Out fee & Refundable Deposit', '•Renters Insurance Required', '•Tenant(s) pays PG&E', '•Water & Trash Included', '•NO Pets', '•NO Smoking', '415 Properties, CalBRE 02055634', '©Golden Gate Properties 2022, All Rights Reserved.', 'No part of this website or any of its contents may be reproduced, copied, modified or adapted, without the prior written consent of the author, unless otherwise indicated for stand-alone materials.', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/2.0BA', 'Square Feet: 1,160', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,950.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $35.00', 'Security Deposit: $3,950.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
